name: Raven Bow
description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>12%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>15%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>18%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>21%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
